channel.title: ThankYou Potion doesn't loop?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "ThankYou Potion doesn't loop?"

item.title: Re: ThankYou Potion doesn't loop?
item.content:encoded:
Then I'm not sure if I should loop and confirm, or use itâ€¦ The looping page has been wrong before, with the duelist's aura (I think aura, anyway).

I'll test it, and if it loops, I'll BR, and if it doesn't loop, I'll change the wiki.

item.title: Re: ThankYou Potion doesn't loop?
item.content:encoded: If the looping page says it won't loop, then it won't loop.

item.title: ThankYou Potion doesn't loop?
item.content:encoded: According to the ingame looping page, the ThankYou Potion doesn't loop. The wiki says it does, and I doubt it would go away from looping. Can anyone confirm that it loops before I BR it?
